mapper.insert: insert into emp_status values(SEQ_EMP_NUM.NEXTVAL, sysdate, current_timestamp , null, #{empStatus}, null, #{mId}, null, null)
mapper.select: select * from emp_status e left join member m on (e.m_id = m.m_id) where e.m_id = #{id} and to_date(emp_regi_date,'YY/MM/DD') in (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM emp_status) and emp_on_time is not null and m_status = 0
